title: Build Skills Registry System
description: Create registry of pre-built skills for different project types. Files: src/skills/registry.ts, src/skills/skill-loader.ts. Define Skill interface. Effort: 4 days.

title: Implement Preset-Based Beads Setup
description: Configure Beads workflows based on project preset. Files: src/beads/preset-configs.ts. SaaS/ecommerce/blog specific workflows. Effort: 4 days.

title: Complete development environment setup and testing
description: Ensure all tooling works end-to-end. Complete any remaining Beads setup, verify all constitutional requirements (TypeScript, type safety, Better-T-Stack compatibility), and ensure development workflow is fully functional. Target: Complete Phase 1 development environment.

title: Implement Ship Phase Automation
description: AI-driven deployment with monitoring and rollback capabilities. Files: src/orchestrator/ship-phase.ts. Auto deployment, monitoring, rollback. Effort: 7 days.

title: Implement MCP Auto-Installation System
description: Automatically install and configure MCP servers during project generation. Files: src/generators/mcp.ts, templates/mcp/settings.json.ejs. Effort: 5 days.

title: v0.3.0: Beads Integration Automation
description: Automate Beads issue tracking setup and provide pre-configured workflows. Target: March 2026, 21 development days. Auto-run 'bd init' during project generation.

title: Implement complete preset system with validation
description: Fully implement all 6 presets (saas, ecommerce, blog, devtool, portfolio, minimal) with end-to-end testing. Add preset validation, override system, custom preset creation. Ensure each preset generates working projects. Target: Complete preset system with validation.

title: Implement Plan Phase Automation
description: AI-driven planning with automatic requirements analysis. Files: src/orchestrator/plan-phase.ts. Requirements extraction, architecture generation. Effort: 6 days.

title: Create MCP Server Health Validation
description: Validate MCP server connections during project setup. Files: src/validators/mcp-health.ts, scripts/validate-mcp.ts. Effort: 2 days.

title: Create PBS documentation template system
description: Implement PBS documentation templates: PBS_MASTER_SYSTEM.md template, CLAUDE.md template, constitution.md template, complete docs/ structure templates, ARCHITECTURE.md, CHANGELOG.md, PROJECT_STATUS.md templates. Support PBS level selections from wizard. Target: Complete PBS documentation scaffolding.
close_reason: Completed PBS documentation template system with full scaffolding for all PBS levels (full, docs, minimal, none)

title: v0.5.0: Full PBS Automation
description: Implement complete Plan-Build-Ship automation with AI orchestration. Target: May 2026, 58 development days. End-to-end development workflows.

title: v0.5.0 Release Preparation
description: Prepare v0.5.0 release with full PBS automation. Testing, documentation, changelog, npm publishing. Target: End of May 2026.

title: Build Workflow Orchestrator Engine
description: Core engine for orchestrating multi-agent PBS workflows. Files: src/orchestrator/engine.ts. State management, agent coordination, error handling. Effort: 8 days.

title: Pre-configure Filesystem MCP Server
description: Pre-configure @anthropic-ai/mcp-server-filesystem for project access. Restrict to project directory. Capabilities: file ops, directory browsing. Effort: 2 days.

title: Prepare for npm publishing and v1.0 release
description: Prepare CLI for public release: package.json optimization, version management, npm publishing setup, GitHub releases, CI/CD for automated publishing, security auditing, performance optimization. Target: Ready for npm publish as create-karetech-stack.

title: Implement Build Phase Automation
description: AI-driven development with automatic code generation and testing. Files: src/orchestrator/build-phase.ts. Code generation, test execution, quality checks. Effort: 10 days.

title: v0.2.0 Release Preparation
description: Prepare v0.2.0 release with MCP server pre-configuration. Testing, documentation, changelog, npm publishing. Target: End of February 2026.

title: Add configuration import/export functionality
description: Implement ability to save and load wizard configurations. Add --config flag to CLI, support for .karetech-config.json files, configuration validation and merging. Enable sharing and reusing project configurations. Target: Complete config management system for wizard.

title: v0.3.0 Release Preparation
description: Prepare v0.3.0 release with Beads integration automation. Testing, documentation, changelog, npm publishing. Target: End of March 2026.

title: v0.4.0: Skills Library & Agents
description: Provide pre-built skills and agents for common development workflows. Target: April 2026, 38 development days. Eliminate manual agent configuration.

title: Create Testing Automation Skills
description: Skills for testing workflows and test generation. Files: templates/skills/testing/. test:generate, test:e2e, test:coverage, test:fix. Effort: 5 days.

title: v0.4.0 Release Preparation
description: Prepare v0.4.0 release with skills library and agents. Testing, documentation, changelog, npm publishing. Target: End of April 2026.

title: Create Deployment Skills
description: Skills for deployment and DevOps operations. Files: templates/skills/deployment/. deploy:staging, deploy:prod, deploy:rollback, deploy:health. Effort: 5 days.

title: Create PBS Documentation and Tutorials
description: Complete documentation for PBS automation features. Files: docs/PBS_AUTOMATION.md, docs/WORKFLOW_EXAMPLES.md. User guides and examples. Effort: 4 days.

title: Pre-configure Database MCP Servers
description: Pre-configure database MCP servers based on project choice. Servers: postgres, turso. Auto-generate connection strings. Capabilities: schema, queries, migrations. Effort: 4 days.

title: Create API Development Skills
description: Skills for API development and management. Files: templates/skills/api/. api:generate, api:test, api:docs, api:validate. Effort: 4 days.

title: Create basic project template generation system
description: EJS-based template system for file generation. Implement template engine to generate scaffolded projects based on wizard configuration. Create basic template structure for Better-T-Stack foundation. Target: Functional template generation system for Phase 1.

title: Validate Beads Setup Integration
description: Verify Beads integration is working correctly. Files: src/validators/beads-health.ts. Health checks and validation. Effort: 2 days.

title: Create comprehensive E2E testing suite
description: Implement complete E2E testing covering all wizard combinations: all presets × all options testing, edge cases, error scenarios, configuration validation. Test CLI on different platforms, validate generated projects. Target: Complete CLI testing coverage.

title: Pre-configure GitHub MCP Server
description: Pre-configure @anthropic-ai/mcp-server-github for repository operations. Auto-detect repo, configure permissions. Capabilities: issues, PRs, repo browsing. Effort: 3 days.

title: Complete all 7-step wizard implementations
description: Enhance existing wizard to fully implement all 7 steps: 1) Project Info ✅, 2) Core Stack ✅, 3) Design ✅, 4) Testing ✅, 5) DevOps ✅, 6) AI Workflow ✅, 7) Extras ✅. Add missing prompt options, enhance UX, add conditional logic, improve error handling. Target: Complete wizard implementation with all options from FORK_PLAN.md.
close_reason: Completed enhanced wizard system with all 7 steps, conditional logic, intelligent defaults, and preset integration

title: Create end-to-end preset testing system
description: Implement automated testing for all 6 presets. Test each preset generates working projects with: bun dev works, bun build succeeds, all dependencies install, TypeScript compiles, tests run. Add preset validation CI. Target: Automated preset testing ensuring quality.

title: Build Advanced Context Management
description: Advanced context management for long-running workflows. Files: src/ai/context-manager.ts. Long-term memory, context compression, knowledge graph. Effort: 4 days.

title: Create Claude Code configuration templates
description: Implement .claude/ directory templates: settings.json, agents/, commands/, hooks/, skills/ structure. Create MCP server configurations, hook scripts, subagent definitions. Support AI workflow wizard selections. Target: Complete Claude Code integration scaffolding.
close_reason: Completed Claude Code configuration templates with full AI workflow integration, hooks, agents, commands, and skills

title: Generate MCP Environment Documentation
description: Generate .env.example with required MCP server variables. Document all required tokens and configuration. Effort: 1 day.

title: Create Better-T-Stack base template system
description: Implement EJS template system for generating Better-T-Stack projects. Create base templates for: package.json, tsconfig.json, apps/web, apps/server, packages/db, packages/auth. Implement template rendering engine and file generation logic. Target: Functional base scaffolding system.
close_reason: Completed base template system with dependency resolution, EJS templating, and Better-T-Stack integration

title: Create complete project documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation: README.md with usage examples, API documentation, troubleshooting guide, contribution guidelines, architecture documentation. Create website/landing page. Target: Complete project documentation for public release.

title: Build PBS Workflow Integration
description: Create Beads workflows aligned with PBS methodology. Files: templates/beads/pbs-workflows.yml.ejs. Plan/Build/Ship workflows. Effort: 5 days.

title: Enhance Settings Template for MCP
description: Upgrade .claude/settings.json.ejs template for MCP configuration. Generate proper server configs with environment variables. Effort: 2 days.

title: Implement Skill Installation System
description: Automatically install and configure skills during project generation. Files: src/generators/skills.ts, templates/skills/. Copy to .claude/skills/. Effort: 5 days.

title: Pre-configure Playwright MCP Server
description: Pre-configure @anthropic-ai/mcp-server-playwright for testing workflows. Auto-detect testing setup. Capabilities: E2E testing, browser automation. Effort: 3 days.

title: Implement project info prompts (step 1 of wizard)
description: First step of 7-step wizard from FORK_PLAN.md. Implement project name, description, author inputs with validation. Include preset selection functionality. Target: Complete Step 1 - Project Info with proper validation and preset integration.

title: Add comprehensive input validation system
description: Robust validation following constitutional type safety principles. Implement validation for all prompt inputs across the 7-step wizard. Ensure TypeScript strict mode compliance and prevent invalid configurations. Target: Comprehensive validation system for all wizard steps.

title: AI Workflow Implementation Epic
description: Transform KareTech Stack from AI-ready structure to fully automated AI workflows. Complete roadmap from v0.1.0 to v0.5.0 with MCP servers, Beads integration, skills library, and PBS automation.

title: Create Learning System
description: System for learning from workflow outcomes and improving performance. Files: src/ai/learning-engine.ts. Outcome tracking, pattern recognition, optimization. Effort: 6 days.

title: Create End-to-End Workflow Testing
description: Comprehensive testing suite for PBS automation. Files: tests/e2e/pbs-workflows.test.ts. Full workflow validation and integration testing. Effort: 5 days.

title: Identify QA Engineer for AI testing
description: Identify part-time QA Engineer for testing AI workflows, validation, and quality assurance for automated systems.

title: Pre-configure AI Agent Integration
description: Pre-configure Beads to work with AI agents for automatic issue creation. Files: templates/beads/ai-agents.yml.ejs. Effort: 3 days.

title: Implement Multi-Model Support
description: Support for multiple AI models (Claude, GPT, Gemini) with automatic selection. Files: src/ai/model-manager.ts. Model selection, fallbacks, cost optimization. Effort: 5 days.

title: Create Database Management Skills
description: Skills for database operations (migrations, seeding, backup). Files: templates/skills/database/. db:migrate, db:seed, db:backup, db:reset. Effort: 6 days.

title: Implement complete CLI structure with Clack prompts
description: Enhance src/index.ts with full 7-step wizard flow from placeholder implementation. Replace TODO sections (lines 35-56) with complete wizard including: 1) Project Info, 2) Core Stack, 3) Design, 4) Testing, 5) DevOps, 6) AI Workflow, 7) Extras. Target: Replace placeholder with full wizard based on FORK_PLAN.md specifications.

title: v0.2.0: MCP Server Pre-configuration
description: Eliminate manual MCP server setup by providing pre-configured connections to common development tools. Target: February 2026, 25 development days.

title: Create Beads Issue Template System
description: Pre-configure Beads with project-appropriate issue templates. Files: templates/beads/issue-templates.yml.ejs. Feature/bug/task templates. Effort: 4 days.

title: Contract DevOps Engineer for AI workflows
description: Contract part-time DevOps Engineer for deployment automation, infrastructure, and monitoring for AI workflow systems.

title: Recruit AI Integration Specialist
description: Recruit part-time AI Integration Specialist for MCP servers, agent development, and AI orchestration. Skills needed: Claude/GPT APIs, MCP protocol, agent architecture.

title: Optimize PBS Workflow Performance
description: Optimize PBS workflows for speed and resource efficiency. Files: src/optimization/workflow-optimizer.ts. Performance tuning and optimization. Effort: 3 days.

title: Build MCP Server Registry
description: Create registry of vetted MCP servers for common tools. Files: src/mcp/registry.ts, src/mcp/server-configs.ts. Effort: 3 days. Define MCPServerConfig interface and server catalog.

title: Create shadcn/ui theme and design templates
description: Implement shadcn/ui v4 theme templates for all 5 styles (vega, nova, maia, lyra, mira). Create components.json configs, CSS variables, Tailwind configurations, font integrations, color scheme variations. Support all design wizard selections. Target: Complete design system template generation.

title: Create Specialized Agent Templates
description: Pre-built agent definitions for specific domains. Files: templates/agents/. database-expert, testing-specialist, deployment-engineer, api-architect. Effort: 6 days.

title: Integrate Beads CLI into Scaffolding
description: Detect and use Beads CLI during project scaffolding. Files: src/beads/detector.ts, src/beads/installer.ts. Auto-install Beads if needed. Effort: 3 days.

title: Implement config serialization and storage system
description: Create system to serialize and store wizard configuration for project generation. Implement JSON/YAML config output and validation. Support config file export for template generation. Target: Complete configuration management for wizard output.

title: Build Agent Configuration System
description: System to configure agents based on project needs. Files: src/agents/configurator.ts, templates/agents/config.ejs. Auto-configure agents. Effort: 3 days.

title: Create testing framework templates
description: Implement templates for E2E testing setup: Playwright configuration, Puppeteer setup, test examples, Page Object Model patterns, GitHub Actions testing workflows. Support wizard testing selections. Target: Complete testing template system for all testing options.
close_reason: Completed testing framework templates with Playwright, Puppeteer, Vitest configurations and example tests

title: Create DevOps and deployment templates
description: Implement Docker and CI/CD templates: Dockerfile (multi-stage, <200MB), docker-compose.yml, GitHub Actions workflows (ci.yml, deploy.yml, preview.yml), Vercel configuration, environment variable templates. Target: Complete DevOps template system for all deployment options.
close_reason: Completed DevOps infrastructure with Docker, GitHub Actions, Vercel/Netlify configs, and environment management
